#### species done based on NEMA1, tallied for each nematode species and arranged according to depth of sequencing, now to do barplots 

library(readxl)

nema<-read_excel("/Users/Thomas/Desktop/Nematobiome/excel/ASVs (NEMA1).xlsx", sheet="Stacked (Species)")
str(nema)
head(nema)

library(ggplot2)

nema$Depth<-as.factor(nema$Depth)

# Stacked + percent
ggplot(nema, aes(fill=Nematode, y=Abundance, x=Depth)) + 
    geom_bar(position="fill", stat="identity")
